sentences.en: Eugene quit his work and after a luxurious day or two in Norfolk, started homeward.
sentences.cn: 尤金辞掉他的工作,在诺佛克享了一两天福, 然后动身回家.

sentences.en: He walked homeward in a blinding snowstorm, reaching the ferry by dusk.
sentences.cn: 他冒着暴风雪上了回家的路, 暴风雪刮得人睁不开眼睛.

sentences.en: Homeward bound , the six o'clock throng bumped and jostled.
sentences.cn: 那些6点钟刚下班的人们拥挤着往家走.

sentences.en: I'd be homeward bound even before Grant arrived.
sentences.cn: 我会在格兰特到来之前就已经启程回家了。

sentences.en: John drove homeward through the lanes.
sentences.cn: 约翰驱车穿过小巷向家驶去。

sentences.en: Marylebone Station was packed with homeward - bound commuters.
sentences.cn: 马里列本火车站挤满了要回家去的旅客.

sentences.en: She always searched for her fellows at nightfall, to have the protection of their companion - ship homeward.
sentences.cn: 一到天黑,她总是找她同去的人,和她们结伴而行, 以便在回家的路上得到保护.

sentences.en: She is ready for her homeward journey.
sentences.cn: 她准备好踏上返家之程了。

sentences.en: She is ready for her homeward trip.
She turned and made her way homeward.
She was indefinably depressed as they walked homeward.
sentences.cn: 当他们走上归途时,她却莫名其妙地变得消沉了.

sentences.en: The platforms groan with homeward-bound commuters.
sentences.cn: 月台在下班赶着回家的通勤族脚下不堪重负。

sentences.en: The same evening the sheep had trailed homeward head to tail.
sentences.cn: 就在这天的傍晚,绵羊首尾相衔地返回了羊栏.

sentences.en: The time had come to drive the goats homeward.
sentences.cn: 该是把山羊赶回家去的时候了.

sentences.en: Twilight was falling as he turned homeward.
sentences.cn: 他转身往家走时,已是黄昏时分.

sentences.en: Winterborne pursued his own course homeward.
sentences.cn: 维恩特波恩踏上了回家的路.

sentences.en: With a very few words they left the spot, and pursued their way homeward.
sentences.cn: 他们说了很少几句话就离开了这个地方, 走上了回家的路.

words.tran_cn: 舒适的，自在的；如在家的
家庭的；平凡的；不好看的
舒适的；家庭似的；自在的
回家的；自动导引的；有返回性的
家，住宅；产地；家乡；避难所

trans.tran_en: If you are on a homeward trip, you are on a trip toward your home
